EmailTemplate.name: ASI CRM VN POSM Request Accepted Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been accepted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.OwnerFullName},
Your POSM Request {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Name} has been accepted.
Please click this link {!ASI_GiftBox_Request_Header__c.Link} to view the POSM Request details.
